alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 2:46PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...The Yukon River and delta for Emmonak and Alakanuk. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the river and delta and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 239 PM AKDT, An ice jam downriver from Mountain Village at Middle Mouth and South Mouth confluence is backing up water and ice past 10 Mile Island. This ice jam is forcing water and ice into the Middle Mouth where another ice jam is in place. Extensive overbank flooding is occurring in lowlands from Middle-South mouth confluence to Russian Mission, including significant backwater up the Andreafsky River. Residents in these communities and throughout the Yukon River Delta should be prepared for a long period of high water even after the ice jams release. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
